overview: Faithless, irreverent and sure to make you hump your bible, mysterious stranger Reena Sky shows up with a psychic premonition about devout Christian Codey Steele's wife and fucks him to hone her clairvoyance.  When religious fanatic Cadence Lux comes down with a sensitive vagina while proselytizing the home of Dr. Ryan McLane, the gynecologist relieves her discomfort.  When repressed Christian teen Elsa Jean is denied porn at home, she finds a way to meet her needs by corrupting her stepfather Tommy Gunn into taking away her virginity.  After devout Christian Codey Steele finds his wife Ashley Adams at the church retreat, she seduces him into a threesome with her lesbian lover, clairvoyant Reena Sky.
title: Against My Religion
